Description:
NO PROGRESS PAYMENTS! TOP LOCATION!
Located in the prestigious leafy suburb of Clyde, perfectly positioned between both a thriving city and stunning parklands, Parkview on Clyde offers the perfect combination of community and location.
With Melbourne's vibrant city just 48.1kms away, and Shopping on Clyde down the road, residents have plenty of options when it comes to shopping and dining out. A reliable bus and purposed future train network all within walking distance, making travelling to and from the estate a breeze.
This welcoming community offers a wide range of amenities and activities to enjoy, whilst being close to all the local conveniences you need to continue to live an active and low maintenance lifestyle.
A uniquely planned community, this terrific estate will cater to your every need!
Now is the time to take advantage of these quality townhouses which are ideal to live in or for investment.
The amazing benefits of these townhouses are as follows:
• Directly opposite Clyde Primary School
• Within walking distance to the Proposed Clyde Town Centre and Clyde Train Station
• No progress payments
• No Plans for Body Corporate
• Fantastic Rental Income of $370 to $390 per week
• Maximum saving on stamp duty (conditions apply)
• Full advantage of tax depreciation
• Brand new property with upgraded inclusions
• Receive an additional $10,000 Government grant if you are a 1St home buyer
No progress payments!
This is a huge attraction and means up until completion, there will be no loan payments or any loss of money. For example, if you were to build a brand new house and land package with another builder, you will be paying progress payments and would be charged interest during the entire building stage. With Parkview On Clyde, this is not the case. All that is required is a 10% deposit once finance has been approved and the balance of money is only due once your townhouse is completed.
Once completed a tenant will be organised to move in.
For more information visit: www.parkviewonclyde.com.au

Description:
Picture Perfect
PRIVATE APPOINTMENTS WELCOME!
Contact Us to arrange a time
This is an example of a quality property.
Located in Clyde's most ever popular Belmond Estate, this spacious 4 bedroom family home built by Metricon has everything you will ever need!
You'll be impressed with what this property has to offer including:
- Four generously sized bedrooms Master with full en-suite and walk-in robe
- Quality fittings throughout
- Open plan sun-bathed dining and living area
- Modern kitchen with stone benchtop, stainless steel appliances and a generous sized pantry.
- Ducted Heating
- Outdoor Pergola, perfect entertaining
- Low maintenance gardens
- Double car garage with internal access
- Wired Security Cameras
Plus much more...
This is the perfect property, ready for anyone to move in and enjoy straight away. Alternatively this would be perfect in a rental portfolio.
Being close to all Shopping Centres, Primary & Secondary schools, Child care centres and lots of parks to play. As well as Casey Fields Sporting Complex, Casey Race Swimming centre and Casey Fields Sporting Complex all close by. Many fantastic schools are within walking distance or just a short drive away,
**PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT ALL OPENS**

Description:
Homely, Stylish and Convenient!
Located in family focused Hartleigh estate which provides modern, quality & convenient life with easy access to all necessary amenities and peaceful surroundings.
Elegantly designed with contemporary aesthetic, this generous near new single storey four bedroom family home over looking the waterfront filled with natural light comprising a front formal lounge, a master bedroom with walk-in robe & ensuite, three more rooms with wardrobes and main bathroom, a chef's kitchen with 900mm stainless steel undermount appliances, overlooking dining and living area, a fully covered alfresco with outdoor kitchen, a fabulous designer front and back landscaping idea for young explorers and all year BBQ
Your new home offers you
- High Ceilings
- Floating floors throughout the home (No Carpets in bedrooms)
- Front spacious living room overlooking the fabulous waterfront
- Spacious master bedroom
- LED Down lights
- Evaporative cooling
- Ducted heating
- Stone Benchtops in kitchen, ensuite, bathroom & Laundry
- Laundry with overhead cupboards
- Undermount five burner cooktop & oven
- Dishwasher
- Mosaic Tiled splash back
- Pendant lights to kitchen
- Double lockup garage with internal access
- All season Alfresco with outdoor kitchen
- Designer split level landscaping to front of home
Your new home is located in east access to
- Clyde Primary School
- Bus stops (route 897 Clyde - Lynbrook station),
- Waterfronts
- Future shopping centre
- Future railway station
- Wilandra Rise primary school
- Selandra Rise shopping centre (Woolworths, Jets Gym, Restaurants, Medical centre)
- Clyde Shopping Centre (Coles, restaurants, McDolands, Shell, KMart, Medical centre)
- Casey fields
- St Thomas the apostle primary school
- St Peters Secondary
- Cranbourne Town Centre
- Cranbourne East Primary and secondary school.
Call Ravi on 0444 522 762 or Dilshan 0402 696 602 to schedule a private inspection for you to flow through the house at your own phase with no distractions and feel all this home has to offer.

Description:
HARTLEIGH ESTATE GEM!
This spectacular family home in the brand new and sought after Hartleigh Estate is sure to set hearts on fire.
- Consisting of four spacious bedroom's (main FES & WIR) and remaining bedrooms built in robes
- Low maintenance gardens featuring artificial grass
- Central heating & evaporative cooling
- Large kitchen featuring 900m S/S appliances, dishwasher and glass splashback
- Porcelain tiles, quality carpets and window furnishings throughout
- Remote double lockup garage with singe rear roller door access
- Currently leased at $410 per week month to month
- Walking distance to local parklands, bus stop and shopping centre
Everything you expect from a premium estate is here, but it's the little, extra details that elevate Hartleigh into a league of its own. Call now to secure this like new property.
PLEASE NOTE: PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT ALL INSPECTIONS

Description:
** INSPECTIONS BY APPOINTMENT ONLY **
This gorgeous single level brand new house is Located in the stunning Lilum estate which includes Walking/cycling paths and parklands to connect communities and in easy access to state and private schools, future clyde train station and future major shopping centre.
This amazing house comprises a master bedroom with walk in robe & ensuite with double vanity, three more bedrooms with plenty of wardrobe space and stylish main bathroom. An open plan expansive living, dining and kitchen with walk-in- pantry and 900mm stainless steel appliances, Stone bench top and dishwasher.
Extra Inclusions
- High celings
- LED down-lights throughout
- Alarm system
- Floor boards to hallway, living, dining and kitchen
- Quality carpets to bedrooms
- Under mount sink
- Stone bench top throughout the house
- Upgraded tap-ware to kitchen
- Fly screens
- Front and back landscaping including concrete to the side of the house
- Double lockup garage with internal access
- Dishwasher
- Five burner cook top and oven
- Covered alfresco with backyard.
Ideal location of this home gives you access to
- Multiple Parks
- Future railway station (Clyde) & Cranbourne Railway station
- Selandra rise shopping centre
- St Thomas the apostle primary school
- St Peters Secondary
- Clyde Primary School
- Selandra rise primary
- Clyde shopping town
- Clyde Tennis Club
- Kingswim & YMCA
- Cranbourne Library
- Casey Fields sporting grounds
- Cranbourne Town centre
Private Inspections welcome

Description:
Magnificent Lifestyle With Sure Capital Growth
Enviably situated minutes from all you and your family could ask, only moments to walking tracks and waterways, local schooling both public and private, and shopping available, 35 Galveston Road Clyde will be appreciated by all.
Sprawled across a single level, the home has both privacy and entertainment flowing throughout with an abundance of space, featuring quality flooring, high ceilings and large windows bringing an abundance of natural sunlight internally. Spectacular family/meals area incorporating a superbly appointed kitchen with caesarstone bench, stainless steel appliances and a large pantry. Additional kids living area means space for everyone to enjoy, opening to the undercover alfresco area - perfect for indoor/outdoor enjoyment and relaxation. A low maintenance backyard completes this family home.
Complemented by four impressive bedrooms, master suite with walk in robe and ensuite complete with stone bench tops, three remaining rooms all with large built in robes serviced by the central main bathroom.
Other comprehensive appointments include ducted heating & evaporative cooling, alarm system, spacious laundry, double garage with internal access, an abundance of storage and much more.
Whether it be, upsizing for that extra living area, downsizing with a low maintenance yard, a sure investment with capital growth or empty nesting this property will be appreciated by all.
Contact Ryan for more information today.

Description:
FANTASTIC BLOCK WITHIN A MASTER PLANNED COMMUNITY!
clyde:
. Hartleigh estate
. Heart of clyde
. Active walking tracks
. Parkland spaces & wetlands
. 425m2 with 12m frontage
. No easement
Hartleigh positioned in Clyde, within minutes of the amazing amenities, parks and gardens and only minutes away from the popular Clyde Primary School, Casey RACE Recreation & Aquatic Centre and Casey Indoor Sports Centre! With additional shopping precincts in Pasadena, Selandra Rise/Cascades on Clyde and The Hunt Club local amenities are always going to be close by. Don't forget the recently revamped Cranbourne Park Shopping Centre which offers an abundance of funky cafes and restaurants.
Clyde is an evolving township located only a short drive from freeway access and all amenities in the townships of Berwick and Cranbourne. Hartleigh is a one of a kind community, located in the picturesque Clyde landscape. Running along the southern edge of the estate is the Hartleigh Active Boulevard - promoting a convenient and idyllic place to exercise.

Description:
Golden Opportunity for First Home Buyers/Investors
Immaculate near new house in a very well sought after Hartleigh Estate, situated just a short walk to play ground, walking/ cycling tracks, park and wetlands.
Entering the house you will be welcomed by extensive vinyl timber flooring continuing through to the rear of the home. The master bedroom is positioned to the left upon entry and includes walk in robe and ensuite, and a further 2 bedrooms are provided both ample in size with built in robes serviced by centred bathroom and separate toilet. Direct access is provided from the garage into the home on the right and a generous size formal lounge/ theatre room is perfect place for family entertainment.
A large open plan living/meals area adjoins the attractive chefsâ quarters which features upgraded appliances including 900mm stove, 40mm Caesar stone bench with waterfall, dishwasher and walk in pantry. A large alfresco area is accessed from the meals area and overlooks the backyard which is currently in its original state allowing the new owners the opportunity to create their own design and requires minimal investment.
All this is within short drive to Highgroves Early Learning Centre, Clyde Primary School, Casey Grammar School, Casey Fields, Casey Race, Shopping on Clyde and Selandra Rise Shopping Centres.
Contact Sid on 0430 037 053 to organise an inspection as this opportunities like this doesnât last long.

Description:
Beautiful Family home or Multi units Development Site.
Presenting a rare opportunity in Clyde, that must be seen to be appreciated! This immaculate beautiful family home will suit those seeking extra space and a quiet yet classy lifestyle. Featuring master with full en-suite, three good size rooms, a separate 2 bedroom bungalow at the back, two separate carports with rear access to huge backyard & outdoor entertainment.
Set on a massive block, 1240sqm approx. in the township of Clyde, offering a country feel in a unique location yet close to all amenities. This fantastic parcel of land is situated right next to the famous Clyde Primary School and only 300 meters away from the fastest-developing Belmond & Eliston Estate in Clyde.
Also With the massive land size, it makes this property a perfect development site to develop multiple town houses or develop the back yard and keep the house as is (STCA). Potential is endless.
To discuss further, please call Vikram on 0430 392 918 or Ajay on 0403 351 577.
Photo ID is a must.

Description:
Perfect 4 Bedroom Investment
Look no further than this young 4 bedroom home located in the Pasadena Estate, Clyde that is currently tenanted to a fantastic tenant who wishes to stay on long term making this the perfect opportunity to add to your current investment portfolio or would make a fantastic first investment to begin.
As you enter, floating timber laminate flooring greets you with an ample master bedroom to your left and a huge double garage with remote to your right, it instantly gives you a great feeling from the moment you walk in.
A family and dining room are overlooked by a generous kitchen that has contemporary features, which include a 900mm S/S gas upright cooktop, stone benches, walk in pantry, dishwasher, microwave cavity, which helps the master chef of the family whilst providing great storage.
Outdoors you have a gorgeous alfresco warmly inviting you to cook BBQ's under, whilst overlooking a low maintenance backyard. Located extremely close to some of casey's finest public and private schools, walking distance to local shops, public transport and parks and recreational destinations making this property not only functional to live in but impressive with locale.
With a lease agreement ending in September 2020 and currently returning $1695pcm you couldn't ask for a more prime property investment opportunity. Call Metin today on 03 8785 0377 to answer further questions or to book an inspection
All information contained herein is gathered from relevant third party sources. We cannot guarantee or give any warranty about the information provided. Interested parties must rely solely on their own enquiries.

Description:
Under contract
Situated in the prestigious & tranquil Pasadena Estate in Clyde, this property is way more than meets the eye. Customised to suit everyone's need, the current owners have thought of it all. For a family, this is the perfect floor plan.
As you step inside you are greeted by a wide hallway and extra tall ceilings giving you an elegant feel as soon as you step inside. Conveniently tucked away and kept private at the front of the home is the master bedroom. The master bedroom is fit with a walk-in wardrobe and a huge full ensuite. The ensuite has lots of bench space, cupboards and twin vanity.
From the master walking down the hall to the main hub of the home you will come across a theatre room that is the perfect space to get cosy, kick up your feet and watch your favourite movies. The remainder bedrooms are tucked away at the back of the home all with build in robes.
The main hub of the home consists of a beautiful kitchen and large open plan dining and living area. The whole space is filled with natural sun light.
The kitchen not only visually pleasing to the eye but has all the bells and whistles you could ever want. Walk in pantry, quality appliances and dishwasher all included.
Heating and cooling are completely covered with evaporative cooling, ducted heating. Security system and cameras around the house for that extra bit of security.
The position of this amazing home could not be any better, just across the road from a massive park and nestled in to an incredible pocket of Pasadena Estate, within short distance to Bus Stops, Casey Fields, Casey Race with also schools in the area St Peters Clyde North Campus, Clyde Primary and St Thomas the Apostle Catholic Primary just to name a few.
Neighbouring shopping centres such as shopping on Clyde and Cranbourne Park shopping Centre just a stone's throw away. Short distance to Cranbourne station for a commute or easy access to the South Gippsland Highway giving quick access to
both the South East and Mornington areas.

Description:
WHEN ONLY THE BEST WILL DO! - EDGEBROOK ESTATE
Light filled, spacious and beautifully upgraded, this near new low maintenance home is quite simply superb. From the moment you enter, you will experience a feeling of space and light with a study to your left. The raised ceilings and widened hallway draw you down past the internal garage access and laundry to the generous sized master bedroom that feels as though it's within it's own suite with a massive powder room & separate bathroom adjacent. The remaining bedroom is definitely of great size & both are finished with mirrored built in robes. To the rear is a stunning kitchen with 900mm freestanding cooker, dishwasher and ample stone bench space blending perfectly with the living area from where you can access the perfectly finished rear yard through double stacker doors. With ducted heating, split system cooling, exposed aggregate finish to front and back, this Metricon home is missing absolutely nothing and will impress the most fastidious buyer. Your inspection is not only welcomed but highly recommended!

Description:
Almost new and spacious
If you're looking for a large family residence with plenty of space to entertain, this modern four-bedroom property could be the perfect place to call home!
The appealing façade of this double-storey abode immediately makes an impression, but what waits behind the double-door entry will continue to impress. The functional layout begins with the bright and airy tiled hallway that leads to theexpansiveopen-plan family/dining area.
The adjoining kitchen with breakfast bar features stylish stone bench tops, electric oven with gas cooktop, dishwasher, and huge walk-in pantry. The lower level also comprises a powder room, laundry, linen closet, and a formal lounge/dining area perfect for entertaining or relaxing with guests.
Moving to the upper level, you'll find a generous living area and four large bedrooms each featuring a walk-in robe. This is a home that takes storage seriously! The master suite is spectacular with doublerobe, a balcony with views to the Dandenongs, and an en suite with double vanity and stone benchtops completing the luxurious feel. The remaining bedrooms share a family bathroom with separate WC and walk-in linen closet. Additional features include ducted heating, evaporative cooling, high ceilings, and blinds and curtains throughout.
The exterior of this home is beautiful with landscaped front/side/rear yards and a double garage. A peaceful alfresco area takes pride of place in the rear yard andoverlooks the garden beds blooming with colourful rose bushes. The ideal spot to enjoy a leisurely weekend breakfast!
This home is situated in a prime location close to parks, schools, public transport,shops, and the freeway. Clyde Recreation Reserve is just over the road providing a great green space for the kids. Nearby, you'll find St Thomas the Apostle Catholic Primary School, Clyde Primary School, St Peter's College, Cranbourne East Secondary College, Shopping on Clyde, and Selandra Rise Shopping Centre.
This is a fantastic family home with lots of space and storage. Enquire today to avoid missing out!
4 Bedrooms, 2 bathrooms plus powder room, 3 living zones
Landscaped front, side and rear yards with garden beds and rose bushes
Ducted heating, evaporative cooling, electric oven with gas cooktop,
dishwasher, pendant lighting, LED downlights, tiles/carpet, blinds and curtains
throughout
Convenient location within moments of shops, schools, parks, public transport and freeways

Description:
Nest or invest
Whether you're looking for that perfect family home, first home or savvy investment opportunity this should be top of your list. This quality built and beautifully presented home will impress.
- 4 spacious bedrooms, huge master with WIR and ensuite, remaining bedrooms with double BIR's
- x2 separate living areas, centrally located kitchen with caesarstone benchtops, s/s oven, gas cooktop, dishwasher and tiled splashback
- Gas ducted heating, s/s air-conditioning, new carpet, engineered timber flooring
- Alfresco with great sized backyard including room for side access. Ideal for boat/caravan/truck/trailer storage. Double lock up garage with internal access
Close to parks and sporting facilities, Casey Fields, local shopping centre, local schools, childcare centres, Casey Race and so much more. Don't miss this one.
Call Daniel Boyle or Narelle Casey now to inspect.

Call Harry now!!!!!

Description:
Brand new home ready to move in
Edgebrook is carefully designed by reputed developer stockland to meet family lifestyle, livability and convenience,
with walking tracks, dog parks and picturesque Clyde Creek running through middle of the estate and surrounded with all necessary amnesties, edgebrook is the place to call home.
Comprising a master bedroom with walk in robe and luxurious en-suite with double vanities. Three more spacious bedroom with generous wardrobe spaces and a stylish main bathroom. Cook up a storm with your fully equipped designer kitchen with adjoining open-plan dining & living area, additional separate theatre and a Leisure room.
If you're a first home buyer, you may be eligible for the $10,000 FHOG and stamp duty savings
Other features include
- European 900mm Stainless steel appliances
- Caesar-Stone grand island bench (with breakfast bar)
- Large walk-in pantry
- Ducted heating
- Stone Benchtops in Kitchen, Ensite & Bathroom
- Pendent lights in Kitche
- 900mm Five burner Cooktop
- 900mm Oven
- Front landscaping
- Remote control panel lift garage
- Fully fenced
- Feature wooden ceiling at entry
- Downlights all throughout
- Elegant floating boards to hallway, living, meals, kitchen
- Quality Carpets to Bedrooms
- Well designed Alfresco
Your new home is located in east access to
- Bus stops (route 897 Clyde - Lynbrook station),
- Waterfronts
- Future shopping centre
- Future railway station
- Wilandra Rise primary school
- Selandra Rise shopping centre (Woolworths, Jets Gym, Restaurants, Medical centre)
- Clyde Shopping Centre (Coles, restaurants, McDolands, Shell, KMart, Medical centre)
- Casey fields
- St Thomas the apostle primary school
- St Peters Secondary
- Cranbourne Town Centre
- Cranbourne East Primary and secondary school.
If you're a first home buyer, you may be eligible for the $10,000 FHOG and stamp duty savings
Call Dilshan on 0402 696 602 or Ravi on 0444 522 762 to schedule a private inspection for you to flow through the house at your own phase with no distractions and feel all this home has to offer.
*** Pictures are only for illustration purposes

Description:
Your Dream Home Awaits you in the 'Hartleigh Estate'.
(1P3316) This immaculate 4-bedroom premium family residence has been brilliantly constructed with no expense spared.
Located in the heart of one of Clyde's premium estates, "Harleigh" and backing onto the soon to be completed wetlands, this brand new home is sure to tick all the boxes.
Offering a long list of features including;
- Master bedroom complete with WIR and a huge full ensuite.
- Bedrooms 2 , 3 & 4 are all spacious with BIRs.
- Two living zones comprising of a formal lounge/home theatre, massive open plan living room with vaulted ceilings .
- Modern kitchen with high quality finish & appliances including a S/S 900mm upright oven and stone bench tops.
- plus a gorgeous butler's pantry
- Meals/ living area offers direct access to outdoor area.
- Ducted gas heating and evaporative cooling.
- Double remote garage plus side access, fantastic for tradies, boat or caravan.
- Gorgeous Alfresco area great for entertaining family and friends, low maintenance landscape gardens.
- All on 512 m2 (approx.)block.
The Hartleigh Estate is one of Clyde newest estates. A refined, the area is stealing the limelight with an enviable landscape of parklands and waterways, contemporary retail and sports precincts, established schools and further infrastructure planned. Hartleigh offers growing families and those who've earned time to stop and smell the roses.
Make this your dream home!!
You don't want to miss this opportunity so please call John Lauretta from our office direct to book an appointment
Insights: 23 Hartleigh Street, Clyde VIC 3978 was last sold in 2020 and 136 other 4 bedroom house in Clyde have recently been sold.
